00023 #ifndef SEMAPHORE_HPP
00024 #define SEMAPHORE_HPP
00025 
00026 #include "object.hpp"

00028 /*
00029  * Here, we choose the right implementation using
00030  * conditional compilation.
00031  */
00032 
00033 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32)
00034 #include "win32_semaphore.hpp"
00035 #else
00036 #include "linux_semaphore.hpp"
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 namespace uStreamLib {
00043         class US_API_EXPORT Semaphore : public Object {
00044         public:
00048                 Semaphore(void);
00049 
00053                 virtual ~Semaphore(void);
00054 
00062                 int32 init(uint32 init_value, bool process_shared = false)
00063                 {
00064                         int32 ret = _impl->init(init_value, process_shared);
00065                         if (ret == FAILURE)
00066                                 return FAILURE;
00067 
00068                         setOk(true);
00069                         return SUCCESS;
00070                 }
00071 
00077                 int32 wait(void)
00078                 {
00079                         return _impl->wait();
00080                 }
00081 
00087                 int32 tryWait(void)
00088                 {
00089                         return _impl->tryWait();
00090                 }
00091 
00095                 int32 post(void)
00096                 {
00097                         return _impl->post();
00098                 }
00099 
00103                 uint32 getValue(void)
00104                 {
00105                         return _impl->getValue();
00106                 }
00107 
00111                 char* getErrorString()
00112                 {
00113                         return _impl->getErrorString();
00114                 }
00115                 
00116         private:
00117                 /* specific implementation */
00118                 Impl_Semaphore* _impl;
00119         };
00120 }
